abstract: A U.S. judge said he would rule by the end of March on whether or not to grant a request by Citigroup to move a lawsuit by Terra Firma Capital Partners to London, in a dispute over the buyout shop’s acquisition of EMI Group, Reuters reported.
snippet: A U.S. judge said he would rule by the end of March on whether or not to grant a request by Citigroup to move a lawsuit by Terra Firma Capital Partners to London, in a dispute over the buyout shop’s acquisition of EMI Group, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: A U.S. judge said he would rule by the end of March on whether to grant a request by Citigroup to move a lawsuit by Terra Firma Capital Partners to London, in a dispute over the buyout shop’s acquisition of the EMI Group, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Terra Firma’s Suit Against Citi Delayed
